price: 9 Parce qu’ils ont en aversion la révélation d’Allah, Il rendra vaines leurs actions.
arabic: ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّهُمۡ كَرِهُواْ مَآ أَنزَلَ ٱللَّهُ فَأَحۡبَطَ أَعۡمَٰلَهُمۡ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: dhālika bi-annahum karihū mā anzala al-lahu fa-aḥbaṭa aʿmālahum
